abstract: While bankers have been reluctant to acknowledge that hundreds of billions of euros of Greek debt is worth far less than its face value, they are slowly accepting the grim reality.
snippet: While bankers have been reluctant to acknowledge that hundreds of billions of euros of Greek debt is worth far less than its face value, they are slowly accepting the grim reality.
lead_paragraph: Europe's biggest banks may finally be forced to own up to their losses.

headline.main: European Banks Face Huge Losses From Greek Bonds
